casebody.data:
KINDER MORGAN ENERGY PARTNERS, L.P., et al., petitioners,
v.
UPSTATE FOREVER, et al. No. 18-268. Supreme Court of the United States Dec. 3, 2018.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the *620Fourth Circuit. The Solicitor General is invited to file a brief in this case expressing the views of the United States on or before 4 p.m., Friday, January 4, 2019.
